column4: Can anyone help me? I want the ext3 partition to take up the unallocated space: http://img409.imageshack.us/img409/9576/gp2gg6.png
Can anyone help me? I want the ext3 partition to take up the unallocated space: http://img409.imageshack.us/img409/9576/gp2gg6.png
is there an issue with using gparted?
it wont let me resize the ext3 partition to use the unallocated space
ah, i see... your ext3 partition is after the unallocated space
if it were before, you could probably make it work
what can i do about it?
well, right offhand, i would be inclined to say "nothing"

if you don't want to buy another drive, and you don't want to lose the install you have, then i would suggest purchasing a commercial drive partitioning software, like partition magic... except i don't know if partition magic is still around
so i'm stuck with less than half a gig of free space on my ext3 partition?
I am not buying another drive
i have partition magic on windows
then the only thing i can suggest is blowing away your install, and being more careful when you reinstall next time :)
aha! yes, that may do the trick
